sub_title: Sr Test Automation Engineer | Chapter Lead | SQA specialist
summary:

  Others: Locust(performance), Cucumber(BDD), Behave(BDD), docker, jest, pyunit, pytest.

profile_positions.description:
Provide technical guidance and mentorship to team members, fostering their growth and ensuring alignment with industry best practices.
Collaborate closely with product teams to understand their specific testing requirements and challenges, tailoring testing frameworks and strategies to meet their needs effectively.
Act as a subject matter expert in test automation, continuous integration, and continuous delivery, driving the adoption of modern testing tools and practices.
Introduce new testing methodologies and tools, seeking an improved testing efficiency and reduced time-to-market.
profile_positions.title: Tech Lead EEP DevOps - QA tech lead

requirements

quality of our products

automation

profile_positions.description:
Working as a chapter lead. QA chapter expansion and organisation in the different teams. QA automation strategy definition. People management tasks (expanded the QA team from 3 to 10 engineers).
Working in parallel as QA engineer in one of the scrum teams. Test cases definition, automation and execution. Testing End to end + Backend.

End to end mobile: Appium + JS
End to end WEB: Cypress + JS/Typescript
BE: Java + Rest assured
profile_positions.title: Chapter Lead QA

profile_positions.description:
Working as a test automation specialist in the test automation team
In charge of test automation for guided selling team (guided buying) and partly in other teams.
Creation and maintenance of automation frameworks for the frontend (End to end) and the backend of different web applications.
Preparation of deployments of microservices for the different apps.
Maintenance of the test automation pipelines using github actions.
Creation and maintenance of security scripts combining the IG from the functional tests and attacks from OWASP ZAP proxy.
Technology used: cypress (js), selenium webdriver (python), behave (cucumber like BDD), python requests for rest apis, locust (performance), OWASP ZAP for security.
Assistance and coaching of the test automation team.
profile_positions.title: Senior Test Automation Engineer

profile_positions.description:
Two roles are covered in this position:
1. As a QA engineer/QA automation engineer:
 Working as a QA engineer and automation engineer in one of the teams (sometimes covering two teams at the same time).
Testing webapps developed using microservices.
Testing both API (rest) and the FE (react).
Creation and maintenance of the test infrastructure, covering 3 flavours of tests: FE/E2E using selenium (with docker container as selenium hub), BE using a rest api lib and security using a rest api library for some tests and ZAP proxy to scan for OWASP vulnerabilities. 
Worked later in a migration to the new stack: cypress.io (JS) for FE/E2E tests and BE with behave + requests library (python) for API testing.
Manage the deployments in the QA and acceptance environments following the development flow.
Evangelise good QA practices within the development team.

2. As a chapter lead:
Define global testing good practices.
Define and maintain test automation frameworks, tools and automation solutions.
Work close to devops to help setup the CI pipelines including functional and security tests.
Mentor chapter members for manual and automation tasks.
Team management tasks (conduct one on ones, performance reviews, chapter meetings, manage holidays, etc...)
profile_positions.title: Chapter Lead QA / Test automation engineer

profile_positions.description:

Selected and implemented from scratch QA automation architecture (Ruby, cucumber (BDD), capybara, selenium) for UI/E2E and also creation of automated tests for Rest API
Created basic flow automated and extended automation for most important features of the shops.
Installation and maintenance of a jenkins server for tests execution.
Defined execution strategy for automation.
